main event: A UFO sighting occurred on 6 December 1957 in Moriarty, New Mexico, involving an object with a distinguished shark-like tail or wings, observed for 45 seconds.
interesting points: The object exhibited quick flashing, incandescent metallic colors,It left a quick fading trail of sparks behind it,The sighting duration was 45 seconds before the object vanished suddenly, The object was similar in appearance to shark fins, Approximately fifteen minutes after the object's disappearance, three meteors fell to Earth in the same location.
sighted object: an object with shark-like tail or wings, incandescent metallic color
witness description: two military personnel including a communication technician and an air policeman, both described as sober and reliable
